title: Cochin?
content:
@fvilanakis revealed the script to be Piel Script. I suspect the serif to be Cochin, but I'm not sure. Any thoughts? Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/script-wedding-dinner-menus-2_6293.jpg)
author: LukeVicious

comments.content: Too small for a positive ID, but it's not Cochin. The outer strokes of the Cochin capital M are angled, but the capital M's in this sample are straight-sided.
